data.actual_result: Discord "breaks". Errors are spammed in the console and everything seems unstable.
data.short_description: Changing the language can completely break the client/make it inoperable
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the settings UI - Click Language - Click Spanish - Wait for Discord to reload - Close the settings UI - Open the settings UI - Click Idioma - Try clicking on the other settings tabs, clicking doesn't work. Exiting the settings UI and trying to send messages works, but you can't see them. Errors are spammed in console. "cannot read property _currentElement of null" You can fix this by reloading.
